titles.title: Recognizing the importance of shared housing in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 6/12/2006--Introduced. States that the House of Representatives supports the establishment of a National Shared Housing Week to recognize the importance of shared housing in the United States and its role in increasing the number of housing units that are affordable and available to the people of the United States.
